content:
# FACTORY REPORT

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Power Generation System at position(-9.5, -0.5)
Consists of an offshore pump (position -9.5, -0.5), boiler (position -6.0, 1.5), and steam engine (position -1.5, 4.5) connected by pipes. The system is operational with the boiler regularly refilled with coal (currently contains 9 coal). A power pole was added at position (-1.5, 7.5) to extend the power grid.

### Iron Mining and Smelting at position(18.5, 73.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill (position 18.5, 73.5) mining iron ore
- Wooden chest (position 18.5, 75.5) collecting iron ore (currently contains 757 iron ore)
- Transport belt (position 19.5, 75.5) to move iron ore
- Stone furnace (position 21.0, 76.0) for smelting iron ore with coal (currently contains 42 coal and 3 iron ore)
- Output inserter (position 22.5, 76.5) moving iron plates
- Output chest (position 23.5, 76.5) storing iron plates (currently contains 211 iron plates)
- Additional unused stone furnace (position 19.0, 77.0)
- Transport belt (position 24.5, 76.5) and inserter (position 24.5, 77.5) connected to power grid to move iron plates

### Copper Mining and Smelting at position(-48.5, 78.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Electric mining drill (position -48.5, 78.5) mining copper ore
- Wooden chest (position -48.5, 80.5) collecting copper ore (currently contains 743 copper ore)
- Primary stone furnace (position -46.0, 81.0) smelting copper ore with coal (currently contains 44 coal and 4 copper ore)
- Secondary stone furnace (position -48.0, 82.0) smelting copper ore with coal (currently contains 38 coal and 30 copper ore, with 18 copper plates in output)
- Output inserter (position -44.5, 81.5) moving copper plates
- Output chest (position -43.5, 81.5) storing copper plates
- Output inserter (position -43.5, 82.5) taking copper plates from the output chest
- Secondary output chest (position -43.5, 83.5) storing copper plates (currently contains 14 copper plates)
- Transport belt (position -42.5, 83.5) and inserter (position -42.5, 82.5) connected to power grid to move copper plates

### Copper Cable Production at position(3.5, 33.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest for copper plates (position 3.5, 30.5)
- Input inserter (position 3.5, 31.5) moving copper plates
- Assembling machine (position 3.5, 33.5) crafting copper cables (currently waiting for copper plates)
- Output inserter (position 5.5, 33.5) moving copper cables
- Transport belt system starting at position (6.5, 33.5) and extending to position (14.5, 37.5)
- The belt system connects the copper cable production to the electronic circuit production with 39 copper cables currently on the belt

### Electronic Circuit Production at position(17.5, 37.5)
Consists of following entities:
- Input chest for iron plates (position 17.5, 34.5) containing 5 iron plates
- Input inserter (position 17.5, 35.5) moving iron plates
- Input inserter for copper cables (position 15.5, 37.5) taking cables from the transport belt
- Assembling machine (position 17.5, 37.5) crafting electronic circuits (currently contains 3 iron plates and 1 copper cable)
- Output inserter (position 17.5, 39.5) moving electronic circuits
- Output chest (position 17.5, 40.5) storing electronic circuits (currently contains 217 electronic circuits)
- Power pole (position 15.5,
